author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [markdownlint](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint) from 0.12.0 to 0.15.0.
Commits - [`1ae512b`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/1ae512be697e56de7d397e93b8f8e01b949da147) Update to version 0.15.0. - [`569e4c1`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/569e4c175b4b8588242c11ad2099711952f6fee2) Update dependencies: @types/node to 12.0.7, glob to 7.1.4, markdownlint-rule-... - [`8e760b7`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/8e760b725503584e960454f9769e094ee00698f5) Remove Travis CI/Coveralls badges (replaced by Azure DevOps). - [`65052f6`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/65052f620001260ac2a9138fc8252861386079df) Add support for inline comments markdownlint-capture/markdownlint-restore (fi... - [`64351f7`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/64351f73be62d20731b48165cac3db73c58337ad) Update MD013/line-length with new code_block_line_length parameter (fixes [#184](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/issues/184)). - [`1d8b9e7`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/1d8b9e7e62837ffcc187ab36236a3d3a7081d4e1) Add full-width punctuation characters to MD026/no-trailing-punctuation and MD... - [`fa40084`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/fa40084994f966fda079643f528e0b6bcbdd2c99) Make MD033/no-inline-html slightly more efficient. - [`73e70b7`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/73e70b76f3a338d3434a8e6cad0a16c095263651) Update MD033/no-inline-html to handle escaped backticks (fixes [#193](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/issues/193)). - [`5a142da`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/5a142da87c7fe8d7959f5aca4b5b231c5a02d1de) Add Boostnote to examples in README. - [`f31fe89`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/f31fe89d02928e475d91469b97f501d3cc8df2d6) Split Azure DevOps npm install/ci commands into different steps. - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/compare/v0.12.0...v0.15.0)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=markdownlint&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=0.12.0&new-version=0.15.0)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=markdownlint&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=0.12.0&new-version=0.15.0) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in the `.dependabot/config.yml` file in this repo: - Update frequency (including time of day and day of week) - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Pull request limits (per update run and/or open at any time) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.

comments.author: dependabot-preview[bot]
comments.body:
OK, I won't notify you again about this release, but will get in touch when a new version is available.

If you change your mind, just re-open this PR and I'll resolve any conflicts on it.

comments.body: @TravisEz13, this is the reminder you requested 1 hour ago

comments.body: Dependabot tried to update this pull request, but something went wrong. The most likely cause is #10166, which may be blocking Dependabot from updating your dependency files.

title: Build(deps): Bump markdownlint from 0.12.0 to 0.15.0 in /test/common/markdown
